articles.Title: Apache Spark 1.3 Released, Data Frames, Spark SQL, and MLlib Improvements
articles.Description: Apache Spark has released version 1.3 of their project. The main improvements are the addition of the DataFrames API, better maturity of the Spark SQL, as well as a number of new methods added to the machine learning library MLlib, and better integration of Spark Streaming with Apache Kafka.
